meta.title: Contract #014: Bad Medicine
meta.description: SUPPLY CHAIN: No contradictions (No Bin). Trace the custody chain of the spoiled cargo.
meta.journal: The insulin didn't spoil in the warehouse; it cooked in the truck. The driver disabled the refrigeration unit to save fuel during the unauthorized stop. The receiver signed for it without checking the temp tags.

nodes.text: --:-- - Truck 404: Engine OFF for 4 hours (Unauthorized Stop).
--:-- - IoT Sensor: Internal Trailer Temp reaches 25°C.
--:-- - Driver Log: Fuel economy bonus claimed.
